Text: DSCC High Tech Conference TomorrowJust wanted to reconfirm with you that the DSCC High Technology Council Conference and Dinner will be held as planned tomorrow Tuesday October rd Please note the location of the events below The conference portion will not take place at the Hyatt Regency on Capitol Hill as scheduled on September th but rather the Grand Hyatt Hotel located near the Convention Center Roundtable Discussions am pm Grand Hyatt Hotel near the Convention Center H Street NW Washington DC Cocktails pm Dinner pm The home of Senator John Kerry and Teresa Heinz O Street NW Washington DC Look forward to seeing you tomorrow Beth Wladyka

Todays High Technology ConferencePLEASE NOTE The panels on Creating Americas Workforce for the st Century and Building the Communication Network of the Future SCHEDULED to run from pmpm HAVE BEEN MOVED The same sessions will NOW TAKE PLACE from pmpm THANK YOU
